animals.name: Lion
animals.description: The lion is a large carnivorous mammal of the Felidae family, commonly found in grasslands and savannas. It is known for its majestic mane and powerful roar.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: The elephant is a herbivorous mammal of the Elephantidae family, typically found in forests and grasslands. It is characterized by its long trunk, large ears, and tusks.

animals.name: Tiger
animals.description: The tiger is a carnivorous mammal of the Felidae family, known for its distinctive orange coat with black stripes. It inhabits forests and grasslands and is an apex predator.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: The giraffe is a herbivorous mammal of the Giraffidae family, recognized by its long neck and unique coat pattern. It mainly resides in savannas and feeds on leaves from tall trees.
